name: Jerania!
description:
Welcome to the world of Jerania!

A peaceful land, filled with people that care for each other and help others out.

That is, until the spirit of Malakar was released. Malakar, a dragon bent on destruction has risen and stolen our heros mother.

It up to you Aiko(eye-ko) to venture forth with your friends Woody and Ralph and seek down the pillars of Malakar and claim victory over the evil dragon and rescue your mother!

You can do it Aiko.
